data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rius, Marc, Teske, Peter R. (2011): A revision of the Pyura stolonifera species complex (Tunicata, Ascidiacea), with a description of a new species from Australia. Zootaxa 2754: 27-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.207177
